semantic-scholar._description: Semantic Scholar API for academic paper search, citations, and author info
_tools: search_paper - Search papers with filters (year, domain, open access)
get_paper - Get paper details by DOI, arXiv ID, or S2 ID
get_authors - Get author information and metrics
get_citation - Export citations in BibTeX, APA, MLA, Chicago

paper-search._description: Multi-source academic paper search and download

deep-research._description: Unified web + academic research with structured analysis
_tools: deep_research - Comprehensive research with sources: web, academic, or both

arxiv._description: Fetch and parse arXiv papers directly
arxiv._usage: Use with arXiv URLs for direct paper access

browser._description: Browser automation for accessing web resources
browser._usage: For JavaScript-rendered pages, PDFs, and interactive content
